events.message: I recently received my order but I want to return it and get a refund because the size doesn't fit me at all.
The system has classified the issue as a refund request based on the customer's mention of returning the product and getting money back.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for this customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I'm here to assist you with your refund for the item you ordered.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the product has been opened or used?
My order number is 987654321. The product is unopened and still in its original packaging, so I would like to proceed with the return.
Thank you for the details. We can start the return process immediately. I will email you a prepaid return label and once we receive the item, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
That sounds perfect, thank you for the quick help. I’ll wait for the return label email and send the package back as soon as possible.
The return label has been sent to your email. We appreciate your cooperation, and your refund will be completed once we receive your return.
Just checking in to confirm if you’ve sent back the package and if there is anything else we can assist you with regarding your refund.
Yes, I sent the package yesterday using the label you provided. Thank you again for your assistance.
Your refund has been processed successfully. We are closing this case but feel free to contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
